Talents.Name: Kindness Begets Prosperity
Talents.Description: When <Operator Name> is blocking an enemy, the enemy has ASPD -14 and <Operator Name> has ASPD +14; If there is only one enemy within the surrounding 8 tiles, this effect is doubled

Talents.Name: Preparedness Averts Peril
Talents.Description: When DP is consumed by <Operator Name>'s Trait, if there is sufficient DP, consumes 5 DP instead to block the next Stun/Frozen effect inflicted on <Operator Name> and Stun the attacker for 3 seconds
